com.codecool.shop.model

Class Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codecool.shop.model.Order

  • public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
    An instance of order with its unique id is generated with the session. If you click on add to cart button, the given product with the specified quantity will be given to the order instances "items" list. It then updates the orderPrice and orderQuantity values.

    • Method Detail

      • addLineItem

        public void addLineItem(LineItem item)
        This method adds a LineItem to the specific order. If the LineItem is already in the order it just updates it. Then it also updates orderPrice and orderQuantity.
        Parameters:
        item - LineItem object to be added to the order.
